message: Hello Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. I am confident it will be equally valuable to you. For this exceptional item, I am offering it at a special price of $750000.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. It's a good starting point.  I'm interested in the product, but I'm only willing to go up to $700000 at this time. Let's see if we can find some common ground.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. While I understand your position, I must respectfully decline the counteroffer. I believe the true value of this item justifies a higher price. Considering the unique attributes and potential benefits it offers, I am willing to negotiate further. How about we aim for a compromise at $725000?
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  I'm still a bit hesitant to go that high.  How about we meet in the middle at $712500?  I'm confident we can find a deal that works for both of us.

I'm glad you're willing to negotiate, Bob. I understand your concerns and respect your position. To further explore a mutually beneficial agreement, how about we set the product price at $717500? This figure aims to balance our interests while providing a reasonable profit for me. I hope this suggestion will lead us towards a successful transaction.
